data.message: Requests for help. My profile has blocked, how do I connect it? There is no information to make contact

replies.message: Hi Kristina. It sounds like you may have used a feature in a way that could be considered abusive, even if you didn't mean to. Hold tight until you can access the feature again. In the meantime, you can read more about Facebook policies at: https://www.facebook.com/help/116393198446749?sr=1&sid=0nEA9Re5zkLwtYL47. -Sarah

Thanks for the reply. and how to find out whether it's really just a suspension. they treat that I use as a profile of the business, was ordered to change the profile to access the site. Peke it, but I can not log in, even though I can see that it works, people she temporary
No problem, Kristina. Blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days. We hope this helps answer your question! -Rose
and as far as max wait, because already looking forward to 2 weeks
